body_html: The general form of this is called tensor contraction. The underlying Eigen library supports this, but the functionality is not currently exposed by TensorFlow (ironically, given the name). It is also possible to implement tensor contraction as a sequences of transpose->reshape->matmul->reshape->transpose ops, which can be quite efficient. We have such an implementation of this approach as well, but some work is needed on the shape inference part, but I think we should try to include it in the open source version.
